DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Case Summary Problem Resolution Comments Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Comments made in regards to the resolution of an issue with the tissue.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Case Summary Problem Resolution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A problem requiring investigation._A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.
